comments.text:
windows - vista and win7

there is no highlight of pane's border when an element in the pane (or the pane) has focus. So if you're coming back to your computer after some period of time for example, it's hard to know which pane has an item in focus. And by extension finding the item in focus is less immediate - it should be made more obvious, with the UI drawing your eye to some area of the screen.

using F6 to go between panes:
* folder highlights, but folder pane border does not
* message thread highlights, but thread pane border does not
* messages preview has no visible indication whatsoever

bwinton: on Mac, message preview pane ... I get a line of dots around it if I tab to it, but nothing if I click it.
